name: Children’s Ministry @ 50
description:
elebrate 50 years of God’s faithfulness to the Children’s Ministry of the Church of Pentecost with this vibrant and comfortable commemorative T-shirt.

Material: Soft, breathable cotton blend – perfect for everyday wear.

Design: Features the official Children’s Ministry @ 50 anniversary logo, symbolizing growth, unity, and the next generation for Christ.

Colors: Available in multiple bright, child-friendly colors.

Fit: Unisex sizes for children and youth.

Occasion: Ideal for anniversary celebrations, church services, outreach programs, and everyday ministry events.
